    • Constructor Detail

      • Drone

        public Drone​(double startX,
             double startY)
        Define what is a Drone. Each drone should have a start location before a fly and also a location after this fly. The rest of movement the drone can make will be updated after each fly.
        Parameters:
        startX - the x-coordinate of drone start location before flying
        startY - the x-coordinate of drone start location before flying
        currentX - the x-coordinate of drone current location after the fly
        currentY - the y-coordinate of drone current location after the fly
        restOfMoves - number of movements left that drone could make

    • Method Detail

      • setrestOfMoves

        public void setrestOfMoves​(java.lang.Integer maxMoves)

      • getRestOfMoves

        public java.lang.Integer getRestOfMoves()

      • fly

        public void fly​(double distance,
                java.lang.Integer direction)
        Define the way for a fly or the way how does the drone move once. Each time before the drone really flies, the location after this fly will be checked to see if this fly is allowed. If this fly makes the drone be outside the confinement area, then this fly is not allowed, vice versa. The number of possible movements left will be updated for each success fly. The distance for each fly is at most 0.0003 degrees.
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance will be flied.
        direction - the direction will be followed by the drone.

      • isOutOfRegion

        public boolean isOutOfRegion()
        Check is the drone location is inside the confinement area. If so, return true. Otherwise, return false.
        Returns:
        a boolean value representing if the location of the drone is out of region allowed.

      • canRead

        public boolean canRead​(Sensor sensor)
        Check if the sensor is in range such that it can be read by the drone.
        Parameters:
        a - sensor(with its air quality reading,its W3W location, its actual coordinate corresponding to its W3W location and its battery reading)
        Returns:
        a boolean value representing if the sensor could be read.
